CIRCULAR  NO.    3 /  2002 
 
Sub:- INSTRUCTIONS ON ISSUE OF CIRCULAR  
 
It   has been noticed that   when ever   it  is required   to  issue  a  Circular   
on certain  issues  the  concerned  Divisions  do  not    send   draft  Circular  to   
Policy  Division  for   vetting and issue.  As a result    the    exact requirements 
are not   properly projected in the   said   Circular.  In future   the concerned    
Division  Heads  shall   send the  draft  Circular   to   Policy   Division  for  vetting   
/ issue   is   such a  Circular  is   required to be   issued  from their   Division.  
This  shall be   strictly  implemented. 
 
(R. K. Singh) 
Addl Commissioner of  Security (CA) 
For  Commissioner of  Security (CA) 
 
Case NO.CAS-10(5)2002-DIV-1 Date   :17.1.2002
